scripts.prepare:mainnet: yarn workspace subgraph-common mustache $(pwd)/../subgraph-common/config/mainnet.json $(pwd)/subgraph.template.yaml | tail -n +2 > subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:rinkeby: yarn workspace subgraph-common mustache $(pwd)/../subgraph-common/config/rinkeby.json $(pwd)/subgraph.template.yaml | tail -n +2 > subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn build && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ fredlacs/arb-builtins
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn build && yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ fredlacs/arb-builtins-rinkeby
